const response = await client.search({
  index: "sales",
  size: 0,
  query: {
    constant_score: {
      filter: {
        match: {
          type: "hat",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    hat_prices: {
      sum: {
        field: "price",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
